bio: Crattoo is created through the energy that resides in the Infinite Inferno. It is nearly impossible to summon alone.

soultimate.name: Fishscale Shanty
soultimate.inspiritEffects: Increases own Defense by 350% for 30 seconds
soultimate.description: Defense greatly increased, and foes focus on you.

skill.effect: Drops incoming damage by 20% and gives super armor.
skill.name: Tough Scales

name: Crattoo
